img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/26/Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg)| Iron Pellet| Rare | Using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks and now provides considerable Damage Reduction | Purchased from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge| Iron Pellet
![Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4e/Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg)| Tiger Relic| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases critical hit chance for a short duration. | Found beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge (Requires Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone), on a platform above the slope down towards Xu Dog Need to jump as soon as you start sliding | Tiger Relic
img_below_text:
![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 7 from the file 'Soaks.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/26/Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg)| Iron Pellet| Rare | Using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks and now provides considerable Damage Reduction | Purchased from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge| Iron Pellet
![Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4e/Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg)| Tiger Relic| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases critical hit chance for a short duration. | Found beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge (Requires Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone), on a platform above the slope down towards Xu Dog Need to jump as soon as you start sliding | Tiger Relic"
            - Following Text: "![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a Ram Skull, which is classified as a rare item in the context of the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item, when used with the gourd, significantly increases the user's defense for a short duration. It is located in the game at the top of the Stone Summit in Yellow Wind Ridge. The Ram Skull serves as a powerful defensive artifact within the game's narrative, enhancing the player's ability to withstand attacks.
